page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The Cricketers pub was opened in 1884 and is situated in Addington village road.It offers a snack and food.Fridays and Saturdays are the busiest nights in the village.The pub has never been rented out for receptions or parties as it is quite a small pub. The church hallis almost opposite to the Cricketers,it is mainly used for children for clubs like brownies,scouts,cubs and guides.The area around Addington village is nearly all parks and golf courses.The main park is Addington park which has a cricket pitch and a football field. The two golf courses in the area are Addington palace golf courses which is run by an ex-professional,for members only,and there is also Addington golf course situated behind Falconwood road.
